links.title: You: ""Kim, what is the *ICM*?""
links.text: "Kim, what is the *ICM*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Insulindian Citizens Militia. It's..."
links.text: "Insulindian Citizens Militia. It's the official name of the communards' army. The Black and White Army of the Revolution."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Sounds an awful lot like..."
links.text: Sounds an awful lot like...

links.title: You: ""RCM... It sounds like RCM -- Revac..."
links.text: "RCM... It sounds like RCM -- Revachol Citizens Militia."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It does.""
links.text: "It does."

links.title: You: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The RCM *may* descend from the ICM.""
links.text: "The RCM *may* descend from the ICM."

links.title: You: ""*May*?""
Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's impossible to say." He looks..."
links.text: "It's impossible to say." He looks toward the darkened doorway. "It was chaos after the war. The name was good for getting people to join us -- Revachol West was mostly workers and criminals..."

links.title: Rhetoric: "...nice *political* thoughts rush t..."
links.text: ...nice *political* thoughts rush through your neocortex.

links.title: Endurance: "It's gonna be hard to say them. Car..."
links.text: It's gonna be hard to say them. Carrying around all that weight on a busted crutch is making you pant...

links.title: You: ""What I'm hearing is -- we descend..."
links.text: "What I'm hearing is -- we descend from the glorious revolutionary army."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There were all sorts of groups and..."
links.text: "There were all sorts of groups and *groupuscules* back then. It doesn't really matter..." He bows to inspect the barrel.

links.title: You: ""It's a little embarrassing in '51,..."
links.text: "It's a little embarrassing in '51, no? Maybe we need a re-brand?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No one remembers the ICM, the conn..."
links.text: "No one remembers the ICM, the connotation is less important each year..." He bows to inspect the barrel.

links.title: You: ""ICM sounds like ICP. Very close to..."
links.text: "ICM sounds like ICP. Very close to the International Collaboration Police. Nice and *normal* that way."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's just a coincidence, officer..."
links.text: "That's just a coincidence, officer. The CoMil was founded in '32..." He bows to inspect the barrel.

links.title: You: ""I just want to be in a normal, rig..."
links.text: "I just want to be in a normal, right wing police force. That's all I want."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You *are* in a right wing police f..."
links.text: "You *are* in a right wing police force. Those times are long gone..." He bows to inspect the barrel.

links.title: You: "Just catch your breath."
links.text: Just catch your breath.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is better preserved than the..."
links.text: "This is better preserved than the others. You can still read the sign..." He bows to inspect the barrel.

links.title: Endurance: "A mediocre athlete would pant from..."
links.text: A mediocre athlete would pant from dragging around his body on a busted crutch -- but not you, you're thinking about *politics* with blood dripping down your thigh...

links.title: You: ""A white star." (Point to the star..."
links.text: "A white star." (Point to the star on the label.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No." He looks at it. "An *upside d..."
links.text: "No." He looks at it. "An *upside down* star."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "With its horns in the sky -- the sy..."
links.text: With its horns in the sky -- the symbol of the Commune.

links.title: You: ""Are those specks stars too?""
links.text: "Are those specks stars too?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. That's the *uninhabited archip..."
links.text: "No. That's the *uninhabited archipelago*."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "A Dolorian-era symbol of Insulinde...."
links.text: A Dolorian-era symbol of Insulinde. Known as The Face In The Sea.

links.title: You: ""Looks old. What's it still doing h..."
links.text: "Looks old. What's it still doing here?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""After..." He thinks. "Forty four y..."
links.text: "After..." He thinks. "Forty four years? That's not nearly enough time to hide what happened here, officer."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""One of these barrels was still lea..."
links.text: "One of these barrels was still leaking fuel, as you saw. The city is full of things like this. Old bullets, guns, fuel..."

links.title: You: "[Finish thought.]"
links.text: [Finish thought.]

links.title: You: ""Cuno, what is the *ICM*?""
links.text: "Cuno, what is the *ICM*?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Is this a case for Detective Cuno?..."
links.text: "Is this a case for Detective Cuno?" He cracks his knuckles, ready. "Idiot Cat Moon. Inside Car Motors. Is Cuno Magic? He is -- case solved."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Sounds an awful lot like..."
links.text: Sounds an awful lot like...

links.title: You: ""RCM... It sounds like RCM -- Revac..."
links.text: "RCM... It sounds like RCM -- Revachol Citizens Militia."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, pig. That's letter shit for..."
links.text: "Yeah, pig. That's letter shit for you. The *alphabet*."

links.title: You: ""A white star." (Point to it.)"
links.text: "A white star." (Point to it.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Shit looks upside down to Cuno." H..."
links.text: "Shit looks upside down to Cuno." He leans to the side, tilting his head.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "With its horns in the sky -- the sy..."
links.text: With its horns in the sky -- the symbol of the Commune.

links.title: You: ""Are those specks stars too?""
links.text: "Are those specks stars too?"

links.title: Cuno: "He leans in for a closer look. "Dun..."
links.text: He leans in for a closer look. "Dunno. Maybe. Sorta looks like stars to Cuno. Or, like, islands maybe? Fuck does Cuno know..."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Thank you, Cuno. It's the Dolorian..."
links.text: Thank you, Cuno. It's the Dolorian symbol of Insulinde -- the face in the sea.

links.title: You: ""Looks old. What is it still doing..."
links.text: "Looks old. What is it still doing here?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Who the fuck's gonna move it? The..."
links.text: "Who the fuck's gonna move it? The island janitor?"

links.title: You: "[Finish thought.]"
links.text: [Finish thought.]

links.title: You: "Huh, what is the ICM?"
links.text: Huh, what is the ICM?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Insulindian Citizens Militia, the o..."
links.text: Insulindian Citizens Militia, the official name of the communards' army. The army of the Revolution.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Sounds an awful lot like..."
links.text: Sounds an awful lot like...

links.title: You: "It sounds like RCM -- Revachol Citi..."
links.text: It sounds like RCM -- Revachol Citizens Militia.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Although it's difficult to say for..."
links.text: Although it's difficult to say for sure -- the RCM *may* descend from the ICM. At some, dark point in the past...

links.title: You: "A white star."
links.text: A white star.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "With its horns in the sky -- the sy..."
links.text: With its horns in the sky -- the symbol of the Commune.

links.title: You: "Are those specks stars too?"
links.text: Are those specks stars too?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The *uninhabited archipelago*. A Do..."
links.text: The *uninhabited archipelago*. A Dolorian-era symbol of Insulinde -- the Face In The Sea, as they call it.

links.title: You: "Looks old. What is it still doing h..."
links.text: Looks old. What is it still doing here?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Forty four years is not enough time..."
links.text: Forty four years is not enough time to hide what happened here, on these islands...

links.title: Encyclopedia: "One of the barrels from earlier was..."
links.text: One of the barrels from earlier was still leaking fuel. The city is full of such things.

links.title: You: "[Finish thought.]"
links.text: [Finish thought.]
